<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!pdv-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/domainvalue/#a7ecbb686a014a13d5a43b1139f764dd8">isCollapsed</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExecutionDomainFix::leaveBasicBlock(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> common = dv-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/domainvalue/#a145f2b34d8a016cbf6843c16e5f16c49">getCommonDomains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a40cc6a0e0895fa564ee013923209aa85">available</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (dv-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/domainvalue/#a7ecbb686a014a13d5a43b1139f764dd8">isCollapsed</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the collapsed operands force a single domain, propagate the collapse.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a40cc6a0e0895fa564ee013923209aa85">available</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> domain = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a40cc6a0e0895fa564ee013923209aa85">available</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">    TII-&gt;setExecutionDomain(&#42;mi, domain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">    visitHardInstr(mi, domain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Kill off any remaining uses that don&#39;t match available, and build a list of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// incoming DomainValues that we want to merge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">  SmallVector&lt;int, 4&gt; Regs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> rx : used) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    DomainValue &#42;&amp;LR = LiveRegs&#91;rx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This useless DomainValue could have been missed above.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/domainvalue/#a145f2b34d8a016cbf6843c16e5f16c49">getCommonDomains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a40cc6a0e0895fa564ee013923209aa85">available</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a> = RDA-&gt;getReachingDef(mi, RC-&gt;getRegister(rx));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a327a399b9f6ef414a29ddeffba934d26">partition&#95;point</a>(Regs, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// doms are now sorted in order of appearance. Try to merge them all, giving</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// priority to the latest ones.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  DomainValue &#42;dv = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Force the first dv to match the current instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">      dv-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/domainvalue/#ac900f658d1c226c23057b843aa5df4d0">AvailableDomains</a> = dv-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/domainvalue/#a145f2b34d8a016cbf6843c16e5f16c49">getCommonDomains</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a40cc6a0e0895fa564ee013923209aa85">available</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    DomainValue &#42;Latest = LiveRegs&#91;Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#a0c8ffe664a36e30d49c84d0aded2fe08">pop&#95;back&#95;val</a>()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If latest didn&#39;t merge, it is useless now. Kill all registers using it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i : used) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
